text: Saket Burman (born 1976/77) is a British billionaire. Burman has a bachelor's degree in marketing and finance from the University of Wisconsin-Madison. He is the son of Sidharth Burman, who died in 2015, when he inherited a 12.4% stake in Dabur, the Indian consumer goods company. His mother is Indira Burman. Burman is a director of Dabur International. He has homes in Dubai, London and Delhi. ==References== Category:Living people Category:University of Wisconsin-Madison alumni Category:Year of birth uncertain Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:1970s births
title: Saket Burman
